data.meta_description: We believe the best marketing insights power the best performance.
data.text:
We believe the best marketing insights power the best performance. Unified delivers both. It's why we work with some of the best companies in the digital media and data ecosystem.

iHeartMedia leads the audio industry in analytics, targeting and attribution for its marketing partners with its SmartAudio suite of data targeting and attribution products using data from its massive consumer base. Unified has worked closely with iHeartMedia to create the most comprehensive digital marketing solution available in the market.

With billions of users, Facebook is the biggest and undoubtedly most ubiquitous social platform for advertisers. As one of this global phenomenon’s Marketing Partners, we’re dedicated to creating effective solutions in Social Ad Technology and Media Buying across industries such as Auto, Retail, CPG, Entertainment and more. Our efforts have paid off and we’re really proud to have received two Facebook Innovation Awards for excellence in marketing advancements.

TikTok enables everyone to be a creator, and encourages users to share their passion and personal creative expression through their videos. We are excited to offer partners the ability to execute across the TikTok platform.

Twitter has revolutionized the way people around the globe communicate on social media. 140 characters or less was all it took to get to the top. As an Official Partner of Twitter, we’ve helped global brands and agencies in CPG, Auto, Retail, Media, Entertainment, Travel and more transform millions of advertising dollars into high-impact social campaigns.

Instagram has a unique community of passionate users. Its inspiring content has allowed it to explode into the fastest growing major social network. As an Instagram Ads Partner, our customers were some of the first brands to receive access to the Instagram Ads API, which drove amazing campaign performance in a curated brand-aligned environment. This success has motivated us to continue working with marketers and their agencies to further push mobile campaign engagement and conversions.

Reddit is home to thousands of communities, endless conversation, and authentic human connection. Whether you're into breaking news, sports, TV fan theories, or a never-ending stream of the internet's cutest animals, there's a community on Reddit for you.

With over 100 million users, Pinterest has reinvented scrapbooking and content discovery. It empowers users to explore everything and anything they may be planning or doing. As a Pinterest Marketing Partner (PMP) we were one of a select few to receive access to the Pinterest Ads API, giving brands and their agencies the chance to drive engagements and off-site traffic through Promoted Pins.

Snapchat has proven to be an industry leader, with more than 60% of 13-34 year olds creating and sharing photos, videos and stories on this platform almost every day. As a Snapchat Partner, we work with some of the biggest brands and agencies to create engaging mobile campaigns that exceed their social media advertising goals.

At Experian Marketing Services, we use data and insights to help brands have more meaningful interactions with people. Advertising has become smarter and more personalized and Experian is helping to set new standards in data management, usability, and measurement in this new environment. Being able to identify your customers is the first step to data-driven advertising, and as leaders in the evolution of the advertising landscape, Experian Marketing Services can help you identify your customers and the right potential customers, uncover the most appropriate communication channels, develop messages that resonate, and measure the effectiveness of marketing activities and campaigns.

Acxiom enables people-based marketing everywhere through a simple, open approach to connecting systems and data that drives seamless customer experiences and higher ROI. We believe data is the key to creating meaningful interactions at scale between consumers and the brands they love.

Oracle Data Cloud brings together data and technology to help digital advertising companies drive better business outcomes across more than 100 countries. Used by 199 out of AdAge’s 200 largest advertisers, our Audience, Context, and Measurement solutions give marketers the data and tools needed for every stage of the marketing journey, from audience planning to data management, brand safety, fraud protection, contextual relevance, viewability confirmation, and ROI measurement. Oracle Data Cloud combines the leading technologies and talent from Oracle’s acquisitions of AddThis, BlueKai, Crosswise, Datalogix, Grapeshot, and Moat.

LiveRamp provides the identity platform leveraged by brands and their partners to deliver innovative products and exceptional experiences. Powered by its core capabilities in data accessibility, identity, connectivity, and data stewardship, LiveRamp makes it easy to connect the world’s data, people and applications. For more information, visit www.LiveRamp.com.

VidMob is a Marketing Creative Platform that provides an end-to-end technology solution for all of a brand’s creative needs. It is one integrated platform combining first-of-a-kind creative analytics with best-in-class creative production to transform marketing effectiveness. With offices around the globe, VidMob supports ad localization and transcreation in every major language. Boost ROI with smarter creative. Visit www.vidmob.com.

Collab is a digital content studio with one of the largest cross-platform creator networks in the world. Our hand-picked roster of Influencers generates over 8-Billion monthly views across all the platforms that matter: Facebook, YouTube, Snapchat, Instagram, TikTok, etc. Collab develops, tracks and executes Influencer programs that deliver meaningful marketing results and win over the hearts and minds of consumers. With Collab integrated into the Unified platform, our personal relationships with talent ensure Brand Campaigns are collaborative from start to finish.

Shuttlerock transforms existing creative assets into stunning mobile video ads for every platform. Our in-house creative teams can work with whatever you have available, from a single image to a full television commercial, and deliver what you need. With Shuttlerock it’s easy - when you put your brand in motion, your business results move too. Visit www.shuttlerock.com.
